import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './c_project.css' import 'semantic-ui-css/semantic.min.css' import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'; //For muilt select import { Dropdown } from 'semantic-ui-react' class create_project extends Component{ constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { projectid: uuidv4(), projectname:'', master:'', projectUser:[] } } changeHandler = (e) =>{ this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } submitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(this.state) } options = [ { key: 'angular', text: 'Angular', value: 'angular' }, { key: 'css', text: 'CSS', value: 'css' }, { key: 'design', text: 'Graphic Design', value: 'design' }, { key: 'ember', text: 'Ember', value: 'ember' }, { key: 'html', text: 'HTML', value: 'html' }, { key: 'ia', text: 'Information Architecture', value: 'ia' }, { key: 'javascript', text: 'Javascript', value: 'javascript' }, { key: 'mech', text: 'Mechanical Engineering', value: 'mech' }, { key: 'meteor', text: 'Meteor', value: 'meteor' }, { key: 'node', text: 'NodeJS', value: 'node' }, { key: 'plumbing', text: 'Plumbing', value: 'plumbing' }, { key: 'python', text: 'Python', value: 'python' }, { key: 'rails', text: 'Rails', value: 'rails' }, { key: 'react', text: 'React', value: 'react' }, { key: 'repair', text: 'Kitchen Repair', value: 'repair' }, { key: 'ruby', text: 'Ruby', value: 'ruby' }, { key: 'ui', text: 'UI Design', value: 'ui' }, { key: 'ux', text: 'User Experience', value: 'ux' }, ] render(){ const {projectid,projectname,master,projectUser} = this.state; return ( <>

Project ID

Project User

); } } export default create_project
